attributes.additional_details: We are trying to help different pressure groups to raise awareness on crime. This is very important to everyone who are in danger and to every citizens in England. If we get over 1 million citizens to sign our e-petition the government will take action, they don't have a choice but to hear our voicea. We must care for all the people who has lost thier loved one's during the past years and we must help protect the one's who are in danger.
